descriptionText.attr1: The Sun Gate is both a means of rapid travel to and from the inner solar system and an early means of power generation.
A marvel of technology, it is capable of generating an artificial sun. The radiation given off can be used as a power source by nearby bases.
This area of space was settled due to the unusually large amounts of near proximity of mega asteroids and clusters of smaller roids forming asteroid fields.

Largely ignored, until the newly discovered resource of Outsider tech, in the form of debris from the recent conflict. The dreams of great riches draws in a larger and larger number of treasure seekers, and with them those that truly profit, the suppliers of resources necessary to seek.
